main event: Multiple ships observed an irregular glowing object in the Atlantic Ocean on January 29, 1961.
interesting points: Three ships reported seeing the object simultaneously,The object emitted a glow visible for 300° at approximately 60° altitude,It fell to an altitude of 30° and moved irregularly in speed and direction,There were various conclusions about the object's nature, including possible balloon or missile,The sighting lasted for 1.5 minutes.
